nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(viewId) as 'Attempts' FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo where actionName = 'CONTENT_REQUEST' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START') - filter(uniqueCount(viewId), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead <1000) as 'Plays' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 7 days ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT (filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' AND totalPlaytime < 1000) / filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_REQUEST')) *100 as '%' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT (filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' AND totalPlaytime > 1000) / filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where totalPlaytime > 1000)) *100 as '%' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
SELECT sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/60000) as 'minutes' FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo WHERE contentPlayhead is not null since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_REQUEST') - filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START') as 'Exits' since 7 days ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) as 'Seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT uniqueCount(viewId) as 'VSFs' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead <1000 since 7 days ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT uniqueCount(viewId) as 'VPFs' where actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' AND totalPlaytime > 1000 WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50), percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 75), percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 95) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 7 days ago TIMESERIES WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' TIMESERIES since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT (filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' AND totalPlaytime < 1000) / filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_REQUEST')) *100 as '%' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT (filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' AND totalPlaytime > 1000) / filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where totalPlaytime > 1000)) *100 as '%' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
SELECT sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/60000) as 'minutes' FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo WHERE contentPlayhead is not null TIMESERIES since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 7 days ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START') - filter(uniqueCount(viewId), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead <1000) as 'Plays' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50), percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 75), percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 95) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 7 days ago TIMESERIES WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentage(count(viewId), where timeSinceRequested < 5000) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START'  since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50, 90, 95, 99), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and timeSinceRequested < 90000 and (timeSinceBackground is NULL OR timeSinceBackground <1000)) as 'seconds' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50, 90, 95, 99), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and timeSinceRequested < 90000 and (timeSinceBackground is NULL OR timeSinceBackground <1000)) as 'seconds' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
SELECT count(*) FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo where actionName = 'CONTENT_START' facet city, regionCode, countryCode  since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 1 week ago facet city, regionCode, countryCode  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(viewId), where timeSinceRequested < 5000 and actionName = 'CONTENT_START' ) / filter(count(viewId), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and timeSinceRequested is not NULL) *100 as'%' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
SELECT count(*) FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo where actionName = 'CONTENT_START' facet contentTitle since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 1 week ago facet contentTitle  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileVideo, PageAction where actionName = 'CONTENT_START' facet asnOrganization since 1 week ago limit 200 WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 1 week ago facet asnOrganization  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

widgets.title: viewSession with the longest Video Start Time

nrqlQueries.query: FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 1 week ago facet viewSession limit 200  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

widgets.title: viewId with the longest Video Start Time

nrqlQueries.query: FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceRequested/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' since 1 week ago facet viewId  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT  actionName, timeSinceRequested, viewId, appName, appVersion, city, regionCode, asnOrganization, deviceModel, osName, osVersion, playerName, playerVersion, userAgentOS, userAgentName where actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and timeSinceRequested >5000  since 1 week ago limit max WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START') - filter(uniqueCount(viewId), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead <1000) as 'Plays' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(uniquecount(viewId), where bufferType = 'connection' and actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and timeSinceBufferBegin > 500 ) / (filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START') - filter(uniqueCount(viewId), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead <1000))*100 as '%' since 1 week ago  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(uniquecount(viewId), where bufferType = 'connection' and timeSinceStarted > 10000 AND timeSinceBufferBegin > 500 AND timeSinceBufferBegin < 90000 AND (timeSinceResumed IS NULL or timeSinceResumed > 10000 or timeSinceSeekEnd is NULL or timeSinceSeekEnd > 10000 or isBackgroundEvent is false)) / filter(uniquecount(viewId), where totalPlaytime > 1000) * 100 as '%' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES auto WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START') - filter(uniqueCount(viewId), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead <1000) as 'Plays' facet contentTitle since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' since 1 week ago facet contentTitle WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / filter(sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/60000), WHERE contentPlayhead is not null) as '%'
 WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' TIMESERIES SINCE 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT filter(uniqueCount(viewId), where actionName = 'CONTENT_START') - filter(uniqueCount(viewId), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead <1000) as 'Plays' facet asnOrganization  since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' since 1 week ago facet asnOrganization  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT  count(*) as 'Buffer Events'  WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_START' AND bufferType = 'connection' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM MobileVideo, PageAction, RokuVideo SELECT  count(*) as 'Buffer Events'  WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_START' AND bufferType = 'connection' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

SELECT uniqueCount(viewId) as 'Active Plays' FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo where totalPlaytime > 1000 facet city, regionCode, countryCode  since 1 week ago limit 200 WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' since 1 week ago facet city,regionCode, countryCode WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT median(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) as 'seconds' where actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END'and bufferType = 'connection' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT median(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) as 'seconds' where actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END'and bufferType = 'connection' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' since 1 week ago facet viewId  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) as 'Seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection' since 1 week ago WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) as 'Seconds' WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection' since 1 week ago TIMESERIES  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'

FROM PageAction, MobileVideo, RokuVideo SELECT filter(sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 and bufferType = 'connection') / sum(playtimeSinceLastEvent/1000) as '%' since 1 week ago facet viewSession  WHERE trackerName = 'jwplayer'
